mdRecord.dcterms:title: Criminal Warrants, Justice of the Peace: Commonwealth vs William J. Poff
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Commonwealth vs William J. Poff Offense: Assault and knock down with a closed fist Victim: William O. Carr Complainant: William J. Knopff Guilty: Fine $2.50, Plead guilty Having paid the fine defendant was discharged Recorded in Floyd County Courthouse 12.17.1887
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Court Records
Warrants (Law)
mdRecord.dcterms:provenance: The Circuit Court of Floyd County
Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University. University Libraries
